attributes.action: Replace Corporation Tax with a Profit Added Tax
attributes.additional_details: Provide an alternative to  Corporation Tax which many companies avoid paying, by a Profit Added Tax (PAT) similar in function and  administration to VAT, payable  on  items or services sold in the United Kingdom that have VAT added. The tax rate  should be a punitive tax rate exceeding what Corporation tax should  produce from companies. A company which uses Corporation Tax avoidance schemes would have  to pay PAT instead.
